column3: Slay highwing chapulis and obtain their legs.
Deliver the chapuli legs to Weidheri.
Oh, hey there. Thanks again for helping me before. Word around town is you're some sort of adventurer, is that right? I'm in a bit of a tight spot, and you're likely the only one who can help me.
You see, I need legs from the chapulis hopping about outside of town─three or so should do the trick. I'd go myself, but they'd stomp me in the ground faster than a sabotender in a sandstorm.
What do I need them for? You'll have to wait and see.
You won't have to go far to find the chapulis hopping around out there. If you can get me three of their legs, that should be more than enough.
The chapulis give you any trouble?

These are pretty plump. Looks like you found a lively lot out there. Aye, these'll make for a good stew. It's a specialty of mine─a nice, spicy broth with chunks of meat so tender they practically melt in your mouth. I find chapuli legs work best.
The Garleans thought we were savages for eating the stuff, but now that they're gone, this Ala Ghiri stew is back on the menu.
I'm sure the soldiers will find it a welcome change from the rock-hard breads and salted meats they're used to.
And you too. Be sure to stop by for a bowl sometime. My treat.
